short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Poshmark Chrome Extension to Automate Tedious Tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-share helps sellers on poshmark make more money by automating the process of sharing their products on poshmarks product feed. This allows sellers to get more eyes on their products. The extension accomplishes this by looping through a sellers items and clicking the share button for them.
